Ok, http://www.cei.net/~dphofrules/scenarios.zip contains the 
scenarios that I have created and play-tested.

http://www.cei.net/~dphofrules/scen350.zip contains the scenarios that 
I am working on.  Tevildo, if and when you get around to testing mine, 
 just download off my website because they are still under 
construction (I have not been play-tested them with a legitimate 
team).  I prefer to do playtesting with a legitimate through the 
series, as opposed to one at a time.  This series is going to be at 
least 13 scenarios and I have only created 4 of them so far (just 
created #4, after being somewhat satisfied with other 3).  That brings 
my total to 11.


I noticed teleporters will not ordinarily let a character teleport 
into water (except for ghosts or faeries) or into trees (except for 
ghosts, faeries, and elves) [no comment why I noticed it].  Can you 
please remove this limitation [I am probably the only one who thinks 
of it is a limitation] from Gladiator:Beyond Freedom?


May I make a real simple suggestion?  When you get around to working 
on Gladiator:Beyond Freedom, pay people $10 to develop a good scenario 
to give the game lots of initial scenarios.
